Lyric:
[by:Tony-Girl]
[00:00.46]How to Break a Heart
[00:02.42]歌手：Julian Moon
[00:06.14]Find a girl who's a little naive
[00:10.70]Who's never been in love so she'll still believe
[00:15.50]the promises you make that you'll never keep.
[00:25.02]Build her up till' she can't see the ground
[00:29.73]and once she's in Heaven that's when you walk out.
[00:34.32]Be sure to leave her nothing but doubt.
[00:38.97]{Pre-Chorus}
[00:41.72]When she's alone don't call to say
[00:46.14]I'm just making sure you're okay'
[00:50.24]{Chorus}
[00:51.00]And that's how you break a heart
[00:55.42]that's how you leave a scar
[01:00.28]that's how you break a heart.
[01:04.88]It's only one girl,
[01:08.74]it's not the end of the world.
[01:12.87]{Verse}
[01:21.69]Find someone new make it all happen fast
[01:26.17]so the first one sees the two of you laugh.
[01:31.23]Never look back don't stir up the past.
[01:35.89]{Pre-Chorus}
[01:38.26]Make her believe it's all in her head
[01:42.86]she'll lie awake all night in bed.
[01:47.14]{Chorus}
[01:47.73]And that's how you break a heart
[01:52.53]that's how you leave a scar
[01:57.05]that's how you break a heart.
[02:01.91]It's only one girl,
[02:05.50]it's not the end of the world.
[02:11.97]Oh, no
[02:13.61](strum once)
[02:16.18]It's only one girl, like me
[02:26.66]Say it was all just fun,
[02:29.98]smile as she comes undone.
[02:37.63]And that's how you break a heart
[02:42.20]that's how you leave a scar
[02:47.10]that's how you break a heart.
[02:51.58]It's only one girl.
[02:56.44]That's how you break a heart
[03:01.34]that's how you leave a scar
[03:06.08]that's how you break a heart.
[03:10.74]It's only one girl.
[03:14.10]It's not the end of the world
[03:26.34]
